test.name: Does the TA's metadata policy for an OP contain the jwks parameter
test.description: In order to check the compliance of a metadata policy issued by the TA, an entity statement for an OP must be fetched in the TA's fetch endpoint. Once obtained the entity statement, the metadata_policy parameter is taken and the presence of the jwks parameter inside the openid_provider type is checked. It must contain the RP JWKS related to the OIDC Core operations
